import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' function ProductScreen({ match }) { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id) return (
